item.title: ::Pickup glitch?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Just so you know what he changed, inside that command you had this:

playerRights > 1

That is saying that if the playerRights is GREATER THAN(>) 1, they can use the command.

When he changed it to playerRights >= 1) {

That is saying if the playerRights are equal to or great then 1, they can use the command.

These are called operators. I suggest learning about them from a Java Tutorial because you will use them a lot most likely.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pickup glitch?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100"); }
Is wrong.
Make it look like this.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That item could not be found."); } } else { sendMessage("Wrong syntax, use ::pickup ITEM ID AMOUNT"); sendMessage("e.g. ::pickup 00995 1000"); }

Read full topic

@Darkning wrote:

you have it set so if the playerRights are greater than 1 they can use this command. Just add an = sign after the > sign

item.title: ::Pickup glitch?
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Hi, i am using devolution v7. i changed my pickup command to mods can use:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100"); }
But when he tries it, it doesnt work. Help please!

Also if you can, post a tut to make dodian silab client compatable!

Read full topic
